backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend modifications related to removing a CTA button and updating accompanying text.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend component, hook, and utility module.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining light/dark color variables and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component toggling between tester and about views inside the site layout.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/AnalogCa: Panel allowing adjustment of joystick dead zones with live raw/calibrated axis readouts and controller-specific support checks.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/AxesVisu: Visualizes each axis value with animated bars, active indicators, and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/ButtonGr: Renders a grid of buttons showing pressed, touched, and value states with animated feedback.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/ButtonHe: Tracks and displays per-button press counts as a heatmap with reset functionality and intensity-based coloring.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/Controll: Renders controller selection tabs, showing a single controller label or multiple tab triggers based on the connected gamepads.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/DriftTes: Captures and charts joystick axis drift over time, allowing start, stop, and reset of drift data collection.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/GyroImuP: Displays motion sensor orientation data by drawing a rotating 3D cube when supported by the connected controller.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/LatencyT: Runs a latency reaction test by timing button presses after a random delay and tracking recent latency stats.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/TesterPo: Shows SEO content, FAQs, and a list of supported gamepads as part of the tester's informational section.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/TesterSe: Provides detailed marketing and instructional text explaining features and usage of the gamepad tester tool.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/Vibratio: UI panel for testing gamepad vibration with intensity control and support for multiple haptic APIs.
frontend/src/components/gamepad/WaitingF: Displays animated visuals and messaging while waiting for a controller to connect.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper with header, navigation buttons, main content slot, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGamepads.ts: Polls and tracks connected gamepads, auto-selecting and updating the active controller.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handling, and persistence via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting backend has no query methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom color variables, themes, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/analogCalibration.ts: Applies dead zone calibration to gamepad analog axes and provides related helpers and types.
frontend/src/lib/controllerDetection.ts: Detects controller type from gamepad ID and returns standardized controller info.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, Internet Identity provider, and React Query.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page showing feature highlights and instructions for using the gamepad tester.
frontend/src/pages/TesterPage.tsx: Main tester interface that manages gamepad detection, controller selection, and renders various diagnostic panels with calibration handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and utilities, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, requirements, architecture notes, and development state for the gamepad tester.
